channel.title: rust on S. Sharma's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in rust on S. Sharma's Blog

item.title: Learning Rust
item.description: Hey there. I didn’t want to write yesterday because I was working on my project. In other news, I decided to learn a little bit of Rust through the Official Rust Book since I used to play around with the C programming language. So far, I’ve found Rust to be an interesting language that remedies some of the problems with “unsafe” languages like C while still attempting to give access to the low level.
